CustomField.description: This is used to push into the "maintenanceExpiryDate" in Zentitle, and will set "hasMaintenance" to TRUE when populated and FALSE when blank/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should be populated if there is a Maintenance Expiry that should be used for the software entitlement; if left blank, the Software Entitlement will be set not to have a Maintenance that expires.
CustomField.label: Maintenance Expiry Date
